summary: A keep that is home to the Dragonborn away from the woes of the land.
descriptionHtml:
DESCRIPTION-
-Dragonmast Keep is a quaint home for the Dragonborn located on the hilltop of a deserted island NE of Dawnstar, ready to be traveled to. Safe for storage and accessible immediately as a player home (I hope). Comes with two areas: Courtyard and Dragonmast proper, the former holding a large garden and smithing area, and the keep holding the living quarters for yourself, a housecarl and a spouse. A secret storage area is in the Enchanting/Alchemy room, and the keep provides a kitchen as well. There are several manikins and weapon racks. The decorum works for any side of the civil war the Dragonborn may hail to, albeit perhaps a more Imperial bias. I\'d simply figure the dragon motif works even if you\'re non-aligned. I felt like the place could use a good mix of different influences. Imperial, older Nordic, and even some Dwemer as if the place had been built on top long after. Mm, looks good I think. 

This is my first mod, so I hope everything works out alright. This creation kit thing is a marvelous hobby! Please contact me if there are any problems, concerns, or praise.

REQUIREMENTS- 
-None, besides vanilla Skyrim. Hadn\'t gotten to using any mods or expansions for the work yet.

INSTALLATION- 
-Copy file into the Skyrim Data folder, I\'d imagine.
author: ClefJ
